markdownRemark.excerpt: What do you mean by completely secure SPA? It’s a static site that you can host on AWS or any CDN meaning that no matter what a user will be able to access…
markdownRemark.html:
What do you mean by completely secure SPA? It’s a static site that you can host on AWS or any CDN meaning that no matter what a user will be able to access those files.

That being said, a user will NOT have access to your API. They can load the /account page, but that doesn’t mean they will see any info.

Does that make sense?

frontmatter.title: What do you mean by completely secure SPA?
frontmatter.description: That being said, a user will NOT have access to your API. They can load the /account page, but that doesn’t mean they will see any info.

frontmatter.title: Yes — as long as that value is authenticated by your API.
I forget, but it could be https://atom.io/themes/firewatch-syntax.
